text: Kyle James Coetzer MBE was born 14 April 1984 in Aberdeen, Scotland. He is the captain of the Scotland national cricket team and played in the 2015 Cricket World Cup. His uncle is Grant Dugmore played cricket for Argentina national cricket team. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Cricketers from Aberdeen
title: Kyle Coetzer
